snippet.title: ROBOCOP (AMSTRAD CPC - FULL GAME)
snippet.description:
Zeus presents Robocop (un-emulated) for the Amstrad cpc, a true classic from the golden era of amstrad gaming which must not be forgotten alongside the software house and all programmers that were involved in making this game.

Year of release: 1989

Pretty much the same as the Spectrum version with addd colour, the music is also identicle as well as the gameplay, all in all a good game from my favourite software house.
I have to say though that Robo's animation in this version going up and down the stairs is pretty jerky, much smoother on the Spectrum.
I have used the infinite energy poke so I could upload the entire game for your viewing pleasure.

I hope all you Amstrad fans enjoy this upload.

Please note: NONE of my game uploads are emulated in any way whatsoever, they are 100% original recordings by myself taken directly from the original hardware the game was intended for, that way you know you're watching the real thing.
I will also always state weather i am using any cheats in the game, if not mentioned then i am not using any.
Check out my channel (http://www.youtube.com/user/ZEUSDAZ/v...), dedicated to gamers who loved the games of yesteryear.

Switch to 480p for best video quality and feel free to leave comments on my channel and vid's.

Keeping the memory of the Amstrad and it's cool games alive!!!
